001.name: whale
001.text: You can ask me to move by left clicking

002.name: whale
002.text: To Move the camera use W = up,A = down ,S = left ,D = down

003.name: whale
003.text: Explore some planets and trade with them for supplies to get me home. You will have a whale of a time. Promise!

004.text: Explore some planets and trade with them for supplies to get me home. You will have a whale of a time. Promise!
